name: Budi Santoso
title: Founder & CEO
bio: With over 30 years of experience in agriculture, Budi founded PadiPro with a vision to merge tradition with technology for sustainable rice farming.

name: Siti Aminah
title: Head of Research & Development
bio: A leading agronomist, Siti is the brains behind our innovative rice varieties and sustainable cultivation methods.

name: Agus Wijaya
title: Operations Manager
bio: Agus ensures that our farm operations run smoothly and efficiently, from planting to harvesting, while upholding our quality standards.
